| prodigiously sexually endowed
}} 'Den' is the name of two identical planetary romance fictional characters
created by Richard Corben. The first appeared in the 1968 animated short film
Neverwhere. The second has been appearing in the medium of comics since 1973,
and in short stories that have been collected for the most part in trade
paperbacks. The second Den also appeared in the animated film [[Heavy Metal
(film)|Heavy Metal]].
